content.text: Hey, I'm (User 1's name). I like tool.
Hey, I'm (User 2's name). I like Tool as well. What's your favorite album?
I love Lateralus. I've been listening to it on repeat for days now.
That's a great album. I've been listening to 10,000 Days a lot recently.
Yeah, that's a good one too. I'm really excited to see them live in a few months.
Me too! I've never seen them live before, but I've heard they put on a great show.
I'm sure they will. They're one of the best live bands out there.
What's your favorite song by Tool?
It's hard to say. I really like all of their songs, but I think I'd have to say Ænema.
That's a great song. I love the way Maynard's voice sounds on it.
Me too. He's a really talented vocalist.
Do you have any other favorite bands?
Yeah, I like a lot of different bands. Some of my other favorites are Radiohead, Nine Inch Nails, and Deftones.
I like all of those bands too. We have similar taste in music.
It looks like we do. I'm glad we met.
Me too. I'm always looking for new people to talk to about music
